data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantToStopCurrentProgress
data.value: Are you sure you want to stop current progress ?

data.name: Message_CantRipThisTrackOrCanceledByUser
data.value: Can't rip this track or canceled by user.

data.name: Message_InvaildeMkv
data.value: Invailed file (not Matroska file or has no subtitles track)

data.name: Message_NoSubtitleDetectedToExport
data.value: No subtitle detected to export. Go to step 1 page and change subtitles track.

data.name: Message_PleaseBrowseWhereToSave
data.value: Please browse where to save the output file. Go to step 4 page.

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectEncodingFirst
data.value: Please select write encoding first. Go to step 3 page.

data.name: Message_TheSplitTimeMustBeLargerThanTheOriginalSubtitlesStartTime
data.value: The split time must be larger than the original subtitle's start time

data.name: Message_TheSplitTimeMustBeSmallerThanTheOriginalSubtitlesEndTime
data.value: The split time must be smaller than the original subtitle's end time

data.name: Message_ThisMp3FileDoesntHaveID3v2
data.value: This mp3 file doesn't have ID3v2, the program will create ID3 Tag v2.3 when save

data.name: Message_UnableToOpenMKV
data.value: Unable to load the Matroska file. This file is not Matroka file or has no subtitles track.

data.name: Message_UnableToRipThisTrackEncryptedVobsubContentNotSupported
data.value: Unable to rip this track. Encrypted vobsub content not supported

data.name: TipOfTheDay_0
data.value: You can duplicate subtitles track's subtitles to another new one, just select the desired language track then CTRL+D or right-mouse click then select duplicate.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_1
data.value: If your mp3 file has a ID3 Synchronized Lyric, add it to your project !!, Go to Tools>Extract from ID3 Or Control+Alt+Q.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_10
data.value: It's a long movie you work with here and it's hard to seek to chapters. You use the marks to seek media time easily, go to Player>Marks.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_11
data.value: Use the GT-Text file to translate huge count of subtitles, it's x 2 faster than usual translate opeation.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_12
data.value: You don't have time to synchronise subtitle timings using the timeline control ? then use the AHD Synchronisation Tool, it can do the hard works in seconds !!?

data.name: TipOfTheDay_13
data.value: Don't you know ? AHD Subtitles format file can save all subtitle tracks of your project ? also saves styles (colors, fonts..) for each char of each subtitles ? A backup of your project can be created using this format.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_2
data.value: When you import a subtitle format, it may includes wrong subtitle(s). you can check subtitles error by going to Tools>Check subtitles errors Or Control+Alt+C.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_3
data.value: You can change the media any time you want, press CTRL + M

data.name: TipOfTheDay_4
data.value: You can set current time as the end time for the subtitle at the player time, just click 'Set current time as subtitle's end time' button in the player controls.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_5
data.value: Do you know that ASM auto check for subtitle errors for imported subtitles format ? aslo you can change this option via settings>general

data.name: TipOfTheDay_6
data.value: No need to manual synchronise, use the timeline control to adjust subtitle timings !!

data.name: TipOfTheDay_7
data.value: If you want to convert subtitles format,no need to run AHd Subtitles Maker Professional at all !! it's better to use AHD Subtitles Converter istead.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_8
data.value: You need to translate subtitles but you don't have enough time to write texts ? you can use the google translate service instead.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_9
data.value: You Don't like the look of AHD Subtiltes Maker Professional and you see the layout is confused ? you can change the layout and more, go to View>Layout

data.name: ToolTip_ResetTheShiftToZero
data.value: Reset the shift to zero (no shift)

data.name: ToolTip_TheRealTime
data.value: The real time (where the start time of the subtitle (or the first subtitle if shift all) will be)

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectOneDictionaryAtLeast
data.value: Please select at least one dictionary

data.name: Message_NoDictionaryToUse
data.value: There is no dictionary in the dictionaries folder. Would you like to download dictionaries ?

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectWordFromsuggestions
data.value: Please select a word from the suggestion words. if no word listed, then you have to edit the word manualy then click ok.

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectAResult
data.value: Please select a file from the results first

data.name: Message_ErrorNoResultReturnedFromServerPleaseTryAgainLater
data.value: Error ! no result returned from server. Please try again later.

data.name: Message_PleaseEnterMovieName
data.value: Please enter the movie name first. The name should be clear (without dvd rip, BlueRay rip..etc).

data.name: Message_PleaseEnterTheMovieHashFirst
data.value: Please enter the movie hash first.

data.name: Message_PleaseEnterTheMovieSizeInBytesFirst
data.value: Please enter the movie size in bytes first.

data.name: Message_CantFindMovieIMDB
data.value: Can't find movie IMDB, you'll need to enter it manually. To get the movie imbd, go to OpenSubtitles.org and search for the movie, when you find the desired move the IMDB should be there too.

data.name: Message_PleaseBrowseForMovieFirst
data.value: Please browse for movie file first.

data.name: Message_PleaseBrowseForSubtitlesFileFirst
data.value: Please browse for subtitles file first

data.name: Message_ThisSubtitleFileIsAlreadyInOpenSubtitlesorgDatabase
data.value: This subtitle file is already in OpenSubtitles.org database !

data.name: Message_UnableToConnectToOSServer
data.value: Unable to connect to OS server

data.name: Message_NoResultNormalOSSearch
data.value: No result for the search ! maybe the movie file you search for is not exist in OpenSubtitles.org. Try to search using movie name.

data.name: Message_ThisIMDBIsInvailed
data.value: This IMDB is invailed. Please change the imdb.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_14
data.value: Search and download subtitles for your movie directly from OpenSubtitles.org anytime without leaving ASM ! Go to Tools>Download subtitles from OpenSubtitles.org

data.name: TipOfTheDay_15
data.value: Share your subtitles now and upload them directly to OpenSubtitles.org. Go to Tools>Upload subtitles to OpenSubtitles.org

data.name: Title_OpenPreparedTextFile
data.value: Open prepared text file (lyrics, movie texts ...etc)

data.name: Message_PleaseAddAtLeastOneStyle
data.value: Please add at least one style.

data.name: Message_PleaseEnterSurroundingChar
data.value: Please enter the first char of the caption surrounding, that must be one char.

data.name: Message_0
data.value: Please select at least one mode !

data.name: Message_1
data.value: Please enter at least one punctuation to break at !
